meanings.definition: The act or process of creating a pidgin language.
meanings.sent1: Pidginizations can help people from different places understand each other better.
meanings.sent2: The pidginizations in this region have made communication much easier.
meanings.sent3: The pidginizations at the language workshop were both fascinating and practical.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for pidginizations turned the chaotic conversation into a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The pidginizations in the classroom were like colorful puzzle pieces coming together.

meanings.definition: The result of adapting a language to facilitate communication between speakers of different languages.
meanings.sent1: The pidginizations of English in this area have made it a common language for everyone.
meanings.sent2: We can see the pidginizations of Spanish in the local dialect.
meanings.sent3: The pidginizations of French in the menu made ordering food an adventure.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a beautiful pidginizations of cultures blending seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The pidginizations of Mandarin in the signage helped tourists find their way easily.
